author: IGN
description:
Check out the 'Stitch is Back' Teaser Trailer for Lilo & Stitch, an upcoming live-action movie based on the animated Lilo & Stitch series distributed by Walt Disney Studios. Don't miss the latest look at the film as Lilo makes it known that Stitch is back.

Lilo & Stitch follows the story of a lonely Hawaiian girl and the fugitive alien who helps to mend her broken family. The film is directed by Dean Fleischer Camp, with a screenplay by Chris Kekaniokalani Bright and Mike Van Waes. Lilo & Stitch is produced by Jonathan Eirich, p.g.a. and Dan Lin, with Tom Peitzman, Ryan Halprin, Louie Provost, Thomas Schumacher serving as executive producers.

Disney's Lilo & Stitch stars Sydney Elizebeth Agudong, Billy Magnussen, Tia Carrere, Hannah Waddingham, Chris Sanders, with Courtney B. Vance, and Zach Galifianakis, and introducing Maia Kealoha. 

Disney's Lilo & Stitch opens in theaters on May 23, 2025.

#IGN #Movies #Disney
title: Lilo & Stitch - Official 'Stitch is Back' Teaser Trailer (2025) Maia Kealoha, Courtney B. Vance

author: IGN
description:
IGN’s Doom: The Dark Ages reviewer, Mitchell Saltzman teams up with fellow DOOM superfan Ryan McCaffrey to dive into id Software’s newly revealed prequel. Plus, Mitchell shares his hands-on experience with Elden Ring Nightreign during his exclusive visit to FromSoftware for IGN First. 

00:00 - Doom: The Dark Ages 
20:09 - Elden Ring Nightreign

For all the latest news and discussion around the always-busy and always-changing world of Xbox, be sure to check out Unlocked. It’s IGN’s weekly Xbox show, hosted by Ryan McCaffrey, and Michael Higham. New episodes of Unlocked drop every Thursday on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, and wherever you get your shows, with full video versions on IGN.com and YouTube. Unlocked is produced by IGN, and part of the Geek Media podcast network.
title: We Played Doom: The Dark Ages & Elden Ring Nightreign - Unlocked Clips

author: IGN
description: Check out the Gameplay Teaser Trailer for MindsEye, a third-person action-adventure game developed by Build A Rocket Boy. Players can get a feel for some of the third-person intense gameplay with a variety of weapons, from pistols, shotguns, submachine guns, and more. MindsEye, launching on June 10 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: MindsEye - Official Gameplay Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
On paper, Shadow Labyrinth should not work. Pac-Man as a dark sci-fi metroidvania where he turns into a giant mech and shoots lasers out of his mouth? What?! But somehow, it totally works. Check out our hands-on impressions of this wild take on one of gaming's all-time classics. Previewed by Andrew McMahon

#IGN #Gaming
title: Shadow Labyrinth Is the Pac-Man Metroidvania I Never Knew I Wanted

author: IGN
description: Watch the Announcement Trailer for Blue Protocol: Star Resonance, an upcoming action-adventure RPG developed by Shanghai Bokura Network Technology Co.Ltd. Players will create a hero of their own to embark on strategic raids, explore the world, or relax with some friends. The choice is yours in Blue Protocol: Star Resonance, launching in 2025 for iOS, Android, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).
title: Blue Protocol: Star Resonance - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Console Launch Trailer for Shovel Knight Dig, a puzzle platformer developed by Yacht Club Games. Players will experience a fresh vertical twist, featuring fluid animation, precise platforming, and dynamic level generation. Embark on a journey to a mysterious, ever-changing well to stop Drill Knight and his dastardly crew, the Hexcavators. Shovel Knight Dig is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S alongside Nintendo Switch, Apple Arcade, and PC (Steam).
title: Shovel Knight Dig - Official Console Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Official Trailer for Bambi: The Reckoning, a horror-inspired rendition of Bambi distributed by Jagged Edge Productions and ITN Studios.

After a mother and son get in a car wreck, they soon become hunted by Bambi, a mutated grief-stricken deer on a deadly rampage seeking revenge for the death of his mother.

Bambi: The Reckoning stars Roxanne McKee, Nicola Wright, Russell Geoffrey Banks, Tom Mulheron, and Samira Mighty. It is produced by Rhys Frake-Waterfield and Scott Chambers and executive produced by Stuart Alson and Nicole Holland.

Bambi: The Reckoning is in theaters on July 25.
title: Bambi: The Reckoning - Official Trailer (2025) Roxanne McKee, Nicola Wright

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the 2v8 Ghost Face Trailer for Dead by Daylight, an asymmetrical horror survival game developed by Behaviour Interactive. Players can once again face off against The Ghost Face and The Oni in a 2v8 mode fitted with new Maps, a disruptive Survivor Item, and more. The 2v8 Ghost Face mode is available from May 15 to May 29.
title: Dead by Daylight - Official 2v8 Ghost Face and Oni Trailer

author: IGN
description:
We traveled to PAX East to check out all the new games, and it was amazing to see so many couch co-op games on the floor! These three new developers make their big debut with three really fun couch co-op games that are fun for everyone. Make sure to wishlist them, as that goes a long way in supporting these indie developers!

Sol Mates - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2420800/Sol_Mates/
" Sol Mates is a chaotic co-op adventure where up to 4 players can dive into quick, action-packed missions together, either locally or online. With procedurally generated challenges and narrative twists, teamwork is essential as you steer, shield, and blast through space hazards like pirates and black holes. As a united crew, you’ll make strategic choices under pressure—one wrong move could land you face-to-face with a giant alien crab!"

Royalty Free For All - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3176720/Royalty_FreeForAll/
"Iconic worlds collide in a hand-drawn cartoon smash-up! Royalty Free For Al
title: Watch Out For These New Couch Co-Op Games from New Developers - PAX East

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Official Trailer #2 for The Bad Guys 2, a comedy animation adventure film distributed by Universal Pictures. 

A crackerjack crew of animal outlaws, our now-reformed Bad Guys are trying (very, very hard) to be good, but instead find themselves hijacked into a high-stakes, globe-trotting heist, masterminded by a new team of criminals they never saw coming: The Bad Girls. 

The Bad Guys 2 stars Sam Rockwell, Marc Maron, Craig Robinson, Anthony Ramos, Awkwafina, Danielle Brooks, Natasha Lyonne, Maria Bakalova, Zazie Beetz, Richard Ayoade, Lilly Singh, Alex Borstein, and more. The film is directed by Pierre Perifel and produced by Damon Ross.

The Bad Guys 2 is releasing in theaters on August 1.
title: The Bad Guys 2 - Official Trailer #2 (2025) Sam Rockwell, Craig Robinson

author: IGN
description:
Join IGN's Brian Altano as he takes you on a video tour of Nintendo's new San Francisco store – only the second Nintendo store in the United States. He'll show off all of the coolest merch from Nintendo's biggest franchises, including Mario, The Legend of Zelda, Pokémon, Metroid, Animal Crossing, Pikmin, and more.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Touring Nintendo's New Store in San Francisco

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the 'We Fight to Win' Clip for Andor Season 2, the live-action series about the journey of Cassian Andor and The Rebellion leading into Star Wars: Rogue One distributed by Disney Plus. Get a look at this conversation with Luthen and Kleya as he teaches her the art of patience on the grand road of fighting for the win. Andor Season 2 is streaming now on Disney Plus.

The second season of Andor takes place as the horizon of war draws near and Cassian becomes a key player in the Rebel Alliance. Everyone will be tested and, as the stakes rise, the betrayals, sacrifices and conflicting agendas will become profound. Rife with political intrigue and danger, the series is a prequel to “Rogue One: A Star Wars Story,” which portrayed a heroic band of rebels who steal the plans to the Empire’s weapon of mass destruction—The Death Star—setting the stage for the events of the original 1977 film. “Andor” sets the clock back five years from the events of “Rogue One” to tell the story
title: Andor Season 2 - Official 'We Fight to Win' Clip (2025) Stellan Skarsgård

author: IGN
description:
Warhammer Skulls is the ultimate showcase of Warhammer video games. Hosted for the third time by actor and superfan Rahul Kohli, there will be world premieres, exclusive reveals, and update announcements! 
The festivities will begin on May 22 at 5:00 p.m. BST, which means 12:00 p.m. Eastern / 11: 00 a.m. Central / 9 a.m. Pacific.


The showcase also marks the beginning of a week-long celebration with marked-down prices and freebies. During that week, you can get up to 90% off Warhammer titles, and there will be new content, DLCs, and free updates across several platforms, including Steam, Xbox, PlayStation, Epic Games Store, Microsoft Store, GOG, and GeForce Now.


Presented by Warhammer.
title: Warhammer Skulls Showcase 2025 - Livestream

author: IGN
description:
The summer movie season is heating up, and all eyes are on James Gunn’s Superman. Anticipation for this big-screen reboot continues to grow, with Warner Bros. releasing a brand new trailer that gives us a bit more insight into the movie’s plot and the relationship between David Corenswet’s Superman and Rachel Brosnahan’s Lois Lane. 

But really, it’s all about the villains. The new trailer not only showcases Nicholas Hoult’s Lex Luthor, but also characters like María Gabriela de Faría’s Engineer, Gunn’s creation, the Hammer of Boravia, and the mysterious Ultraman. 

It all begs the question - who is really the villain of Gunn’s Superman? Is Lex taking a backseat to some of the DCU’s other baddies? Let’s explore the many villains featured in Superman and how these characters all fit together.

Superman is written and directed by James Gunn. The film stars David Corenswet, Rachel Brosnahan, Nicholas Hoult, Edi Gathegi, Anthony Carrigan, Nathan Fillion, and Isabela Merced. Superman will
title: Who Is the Real Villain of James Gunn's Superman? | Trailer Reaction

author: IGN
description:
🎉 Weekend HYPE! 🎉 Twitch teamed up with some of the platform's biggest streamers to kick off your Friday with Marvel Rivals! Sponsored by McDonald's, these streamers are diving into intense battles and fueling up with the NEW McDonald's McCrispy Strips and refreshing lemonade. Tune in and watch their exciting gameplay, delicious taste tests, and hear how McDonald's fits perfectly into their Friday plans! 

Presented by McDonald's
title: Friday Marvel Rivals Stream with McDonald's new McCrispy Strips

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Accolades Trailer for Doom: The Dark Ages, the latest installment in the first-person action shooter franchise developed by Id Software. Players will rip and tear through hordes of demons once again with new weapons, abilities, and more for the Doom Slayer to make use of. Take a look at the latest trailer to garner the critical reception behind Doom: The Dark Ages, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#DoomTheDarkAges #Gaming #IGN
title: Doom: The Dark Ages - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the PC Features Release Date Trailer for Stellar Blade, the third-person action game developed by Shift Up. Players will fight to reclaim Earth for Humankind with Eve and company on an adventure to defeat larger-than-life bosses, explore the remnants of the lost human civilization, and aid whoever is in need along the way. With the game coming to PC, players can enjoy AI Upscaling, Frame Generation technology, unlocked frame rate, Japanese and Chinese VO, ultra-wide support, and more content to find and unlock throughout the game. Stellar Blade is coming to PC on June 11 with the game being available now on PlayStation 5 (PS5).

#StellarBlade #Gaming #IGN
title: Stellar Blade - Official PC Features Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Guardian Character Gameplay Reveal Trailer for Elden Ring Nightreign, a standalone roguelike adventure within the world of Elden Ring developed by FromSoftware. Players will be able to use Guardian, a formidable opponent with an eagle for a body and a shield at the ready. Take a look at the latest trailer to see gameplay from Guardian, coming to Elden Ring Nightreign on May 30 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#EldenRingNightreign #Guardian #Gaming
title: Elden Ring Nightreign - Official Guardian Character Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'Brushes with Death' DLC Launch Trailer for Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2, a first-person action RPG developed by Warhorse Studios. Players can now experience the new DLC packed with brand-new quests to help the Painter finish his artistic magnum opus. Make use of over 100 unique shield designs and earn a new set of gear for Henry in this new storyline. The 'Brushes with Death' DLC is available now for Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#KingdomComeDeliverance2 #Gaming #IGN
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - Official 'Brushes with Death' DLC Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at Copycat in this latest trailer for the poignant narrative-driven game about rejection, belonging and the meaning of home. It follows the story of a newly adopted shelter cat whose space in the home is taken by a copycat. Copycat will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5) and Xbox Series X/S on May 29, 2025. It is also out now on PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Copycat - Official Console Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - Brushes With Death DLC reviewed by Leana Hafer on PC.

Even if you're eager to return to Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2, I have a hard time enthusiastically recommending that you come back just to play through Brushes With Death on its own. Credit where credit is due: the writing and voice acting are still strong. There are a few inspired and memorable plot moments among the largely simple fetch quests. And I felt satisfied with the way Voyta's canvas turned out. It's not bad at all, it’s simply a bit threadbare as a standalone experience, and it didn’t feel like a strong follow-up to what had come before. I wish I had waited until Henry's big adventure wasn't so fresh in my mind and experienced it woven into a brand-new save file instead, or at least until there’s more than one DLC to split my attention between and make it feel like there were more new stones for me to turn over. That's how I'd encourage you to approach this and the remaining two announced
title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 - Brushes With Death Review

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Exclusive 25th Anniversary Re-Release Clip for Dogma, a dark satirical comedy. 

Two fallen angels who were ejected from paradise find themselves banned in Wisconsin. They are now headed for New Jersey, where they find a loophole that can get them back into heaven. The only catch is that it will destroy humanity. A group bands together to stop them. To mark its 25th anniversary, Dogma has been beautifully restored in 4K by Triple Media Film with legendary cinematographer Robert Yeoman.
Dogma stars Ben Affleck, Matt Damon, Linda Fiorentino, Bud Cort, and more. The film is directed and written by Kevin Smith. 

Dogma will be re-released on June 5 in theaters nationwide.
title: Dogma - Exclusive 25th Anniversary Re-Release Clip (Ben Affleck, Matt Damon)

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from podcast Beyond 896, Jada and Michael Higham sat down the the developers of Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 to get some insight into how one of the best games of 2025 came together. Beyond! 
***
For thousands of years (or at least since the 90s) PlayStation has been pushing the boundaries of the video game medium. For almost as long, Beyond has been along for the ride. Join a panel of passionate playstation experts and enthusiasts including Max Scoville, Brian Altano, Jada Griffin and company. Each week we unpack the latest gaming news, gush about what we’re playing, chat with developers and voice actors and explore the ever-expanding world of PlayStation - and Beyond! Catch a new episode every Wednesday on IGN, YouTube or wherever you get your podcasts.

This week’s show is Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Nick Maillet, Nick Limon and is produced by Tayo Oyekan
title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 Devs On The Games That Inspired Them And More - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Official Trailer for Americana, an action comedy crime drama distributed by Lionsgate.

A gallery of dynamic characters clash over the possession of a rare Native American artifact in this wildly entertaining modern-day western. After the artifact falls onto the black market, a shy waitress with big dreams teams up with a lovelorn military veteran to gain possession of it, putting them in the crosshairs of a ruthless criminal working on behalf of a Western antiquities dealer. Bloodshed ensues when others join the battle, including the leader of an indigenous group and a desperate woman fleeing her mysterious past.

Americana stars Sydney Sweeney, Paul Walter Hauser, Halsey, Simon Rex, Eric Dane, Zahn McClarnon, Toby Huss, and more. The film is directed and written by Tony Tost.

Americana is releasing in theaters on August 22.

#Americana #SydneySweeney #Movies
title: Americana - Official Trailer (2025) Sydney Sweeney, Halsey, Simon Rex

author: IGN
description:
In this snippet from podcast Beyond 894, Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 and 4 are still hella sick, possibly even more so since getting a modern overhaul, and Nick had lots of nice things to say about his time with them, aside from the snow levels, which he has a problem with for some bizarre reason. Beyond!
***
For thousands of years (or at least since the 90s) PlayStation has been pushing the boundaries of the video game medium. For almost as long, Beyond has been along for the ride. Join a panel of passionate playstation experts and enthusiasts including Max Scoville, Brian Altano, Jada Griffin and company. Each week we unpack the latest gaming news, gush about what we’re playing, chat with developers and voice actors and explore the ever-expanding world of PlayStation - and Beyond! Catch a new episode every Wednesday on IGN, YouTube or wherever you get your podcasts.

This week’s show is Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Nick Maillet, Nick Limon and is produced by Tayo Oyekan
title: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 & 4 Remakes Look Prettier, But Stay Weird - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Join Lead Game Designer, Olexly Zhukov Malyeyev, as he talks you through what you can expect in the Steam Playtest and your first encounters in the Lost Rift. The playtest is live until May 18th.
Lost Rift is a First Person Survival Shooter Adventure that blends base-building PvE co-op with high-stakes PvPvE extraction gameplay set on a mysterious archipelago that can be explored solo or in teams of up to 5 players.
title: Lost Rift - Official Gameplay Overview

author: IGN
description: For nearly 30 years, the stunts and action sequences of Mission: Impossible have been synonymous with big-screen spectacle. And as expected, the franchise’s newest entry finds Tom Cruise’s alter ego Ethan Hunt risking life, limb, and the fates of millions, this time in pursuit of stopping The Entity, the evil A.I. introduced in 2023’s Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One. But the way the sequel plays out – which stopped being Dead Reckoning Part Two sometime in the last two years – it might be trying a little too hard to top the IMF’s greatest hits.
title: Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning Review

author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Enhanced Edition Trailer for Stalker: Call of Prypiat, the third entry in the first-person shooter survival franchise developed by GSC Game World. Players will step into the boots of Major Degtyarev, a special service agent sent deep into the Zone to uncover the truth behind a vanished military operation. The game is now fitted with a more dense atmosphere with new enhanced lighting, global illumination, and screen space reflections that bring new depth to every location. The Enhanced Edition for Stalker: Call of Prypiat is launching on May 20 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).
title: Stalker: Call of Prypiat - Official Enhanced Edition Trailer

author: IGN
description:
It seems as though someone has finally caught the attention of Mr. Benedict Bridgerton.
Season 4 turns its focus to bohemian second son Benedict. Despite his elder and younger brothers both being happily married, Benedict is loath to settle down. That is, until an enthralling woman captures Benedict’s attention at Violet Bridgerton’s (Ruth Gemmell) masquerade ball. While Benedict knows his love interest as only the Lady in Silver, she’s actually Sophie, a resourceful maid with her own secrets and dreams.
title: Bridgerton Season 4 - Official Sneak Peek Teaser (2026) Luke Thompson, Yerin Ha
